Uses of Interface
fr.upmc.components.interfaces.DataOfferedI.DataI

  • Packages that use DataOfferedI.DataI 
    Package Description
    fr.upmc.components.connectors
    Hierarchy of connector objects to assemble components.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng
    Interfaces for random number generation services The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng/code> defines two kinds of random number generation components.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng.interfaces
    Interfaces for random number generation services The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng.interfaces provides interfaces for random number generation components.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng.ports
    Ports for random number generation services The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng.ports provides ports for random number generation components.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor
    Component and port for sensor simulators The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor provides a sensor simulator component and its port used to offer its service.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor.interfaces
    Interfaces and data for sensor services The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor.interfaces provides two interfaces for sensor services, a data offered interface SensorDataOfferedI for the sensor service providers and SensorDataRequiredI for the sensor service clients.
    fr.upmc.components.interfaces
    Types of offered and required interfaces for components.
    fr.upmc.components.ports
    Hierarchy of ports to expose interfaces of components and interconnect them.

      void ActiveDataConnector.send(DataOfferedI.DataI d)
      implements the offered push interface by putting a value into the data buffer, blocking if the buffer is full.

    • Uses of DataOfferedI.DataI in fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng

      Classes in fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng that implement DataOfferedI.DataI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NormalRNGenerator.DoubleRandomNumber
      The class DoubleRandomNumber define a data object that is exchanged through the component data interfaces.
      static class  UniformRNGenerator.DoubleRandomNumber
      The class IntRandomNumber implements that data interface defined in the data offered interface RNGDataOfferedI that is provided by this component.

      Methods in fr.upmc.components.interfaces that return DataOfferedI.DataI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataOfferedI.DataI DataOfferedI.PullI.get()
      the method get is called by the requiring component to trigger the obtaining of a piece of data from the offering one.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DataOfferedI.PushI.send(DataOfferedI.DataI d)
      the method send is called from the offering component side to make the requiring side receiving a piece of data.

    • Uses of DataOfferedI.DataI in fr.upmc.components.ports

      Methods in fr.upmc.components.ports with parameters of type DataOfferedI.DataI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AbstractDataInboundPort.send(DataOfferedI.DataI d)
      sends data to all of the connected components in the push mode; this definition imposes the synchronised nature of the method that is called by the owner component to push data to all of its clients.
